review: Love it! Creates any tv into a smart tv!
author: Lauren Welch

review: Easy to set up and started watching right away!
author: T Nobles

review: Recently cut the cable cord, and haven't really looked back yet.  I typically do a lot of research before buying any technology, and I did so before deciding on the Amazon Fire TV stick.  It installed without any problems and I haven't had any problems with it yet.  I stream mostly Amazon Prime, Netflix and Pandora and it works great on all of them.
author: Postive Strategies

review: This Fire Stick is the best thing since flushing toilets!!!  It is incredibly fast - hardly any wait time at all.  I thought the lan cable was pretty good, but it is no comparison to the Stick.  Definitely a good piece of technology at a great price.
author: pitb

review: I love it! So easy to get it started.
author: Amazon Customer

review: Easy set up!  I love it!
author: Dar4dar

review: After using chromecast for the last year I am a Fire TV stick convert. My kids love the games. My wife and I like the ability to watch prime shows and movies. With my chromecast I was limited to Netflix and Youtube. Fire TV Stick offers these and so much more.
author: Nakia B. Green "Nakia B. Green"
